sqlReaderQuery.value: @concat('SELECT VAL1,VAL3,VAL4,VAL7 from ',variables('SCHEMA'),'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE c.LOV_TYPE= ''',variables('LOV_TYPE'),''' AND c.LOV_NAME = ''',variables('LOV_NAME'),''' AND c.ACTIVE_FLG =''Y''')

activities.name: If Configval is nul or Some Config val is Null

ifTrueActivities.name: insert error when config val error

text.value:
@concat('INSERT INTO ',variables('SCHEMA'),'.CC_DATA_FACTORY 
	(CREATED,
	CREATED_BY,
	LAST_UPD,
	LAST_UPD_BY,
	DATA_TYPE,
	STATUS,
	DESCRIPTION) VALUES (CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',variables('CREDIT_USER'),''',CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',variables('CREDIT_USER'),''',
	''',variables('DATA_TYPE'),''',
	''E'',''',
	if(not(contains(string(activity('Get Config Value').output),'firstRow')),concat('Config LOV_TYPE : ',variables('LOV_TYPE'),' ,LOV_NAME : ',variables('LOV_NAME'),' Data not found.'),concat('Config ',
	if(startswith(
	concat(if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL1,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL1),null),',Input path(VAL1)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL3,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL3),null),',Prefix Input path(VAL3) ',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL4,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL4),null),',file type Input path(VAL4)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL7,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL7),null),',Move Input path(VAL7)',''))
	,','),substring(
	concat(if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL1,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL1),null),',Input path(VAL1)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL3,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL3),null),',Prefix Input path(VAL3) ',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL4,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL4),null),',file type Input path(VAL4)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL7,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL7),null),',Move Input path(VAL7)',''))
	,1,sub(length(
	concat(if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL1,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL1),null),',Input path(VAL1)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL3,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL3),null),',Prefix Input path(VAL3) ',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL4,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL4),null),',file type Input path(VAL4)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL7,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL7),null),',Move Input path(VAL7)',''))
	),1)),
	concat(if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL1,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL1),null),',Input path(VAL1)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL3,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL3),null),',Prefix Input path(VAL3) ',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL4,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL4),null),',file type Input path(VAL4)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL7,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL7),null),',Move Input path(VAL7)',''))
	)
	,' Data not found.')),''');')
